title: Photosynthesis. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and John Walker
brief_description: Shows how the application of the scientific method has revealed the mechanism by which green plants transform light energy into food. Controlled experiments test the photosynthesis process and shows how each components - light, carbon dioxide, water, and chloroplasts is essential. Also introduces several advanced concepts, such as the formation of intermediate compounds and the effect of different types of light.
